name: S3Upload
description: Build task to upload a file to S3 bucket in AWS.
author: Marcus Felling

inputs.name: BucketName
inputs.label: Bucket Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the S3 Bucket

inputs.name: File
inputs.label: File or folder to upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to file or folder. File Example: $(Build.SourcesDirectory)/examplefile1.txt Folder Example: $(Build.ArtifactsStagingDirectory)/ExampleFolder/

inputs.name: Key
inputs.label: Name of S3 Object
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name and directory that the corresponding file will have in Amazon S3. Example: S3FolderName/examplefile1.$(Build.BuildID)-uploaded.txt **Note:** This field is not available for folder uploads, file and folder names will be the same as local.
